column4: Guys maybe someone know then how to start app from some daemon-user? I want to see what about 'mlnet' compaying.. because I can't fix error if I don't know what happening...
nothing tells me... and /etc/init.d/mldonkey-server executing to the last line w\o any error... and there is nothing in logs...
i've never played with that app but most have a debuggung switch.   man mldonkey   and look for debugging    maybe something like  -v   you could add to the startup command.
